column2: # As you can see, the structure of this function is very similar to the Chelsa-function
# Here the resolution of the downloaded data set must be added
# If no input is given all resolutions will be downloaded
# WorldClim also recently had an update to version 2.1
version.var = "2.1", # Here the newer version is chosen
# here you can choose if you want to keep the downloaded zip-file

[1] S. E. Fick and R. J. Hijmans. ‚ÄúWorldClim 2: new 1-km spatial resolution climate surfaces for global land areas‚Äù. In: _International Journal of Climatology_ 37.12 (Okt.
2017), pp. 4302-4315. DOI: 10.1002/joc.5086. <URL: https://doi.org/10.1002/joc.5086>.
